title: Windows DFU USB driver installation instructions

2.listedWithWarning: If it is listed with a warning sign, right-click it and select {properties}.
2.listedWithoutWarning: If it is listed somewhere else without a warning sign, then the driver is already installed. You may close this window.
2.notListed: If you don't see it at all, make sure the hub is in DFU update mode (see video on the previous page) and try again.

3.message: In the {properties} dialog, click the {updateDriver} button.

4.message: In the {updateDrivers} dialog, click the {browse} button.

5.letMePick: Let me pick from a list of available drivers on my computer

6.message: In the list of device types, select {usbDevices}, then click the {next} button.

7.message: In the {manufacturer} list, select {winUsbDevice}. Then in the {model} list, also select {winUsbDevice}. Then click the {next} button.

8.message: A warning dialog says that the driver is not recommended. Click {yes} to proceed anyway. The driver is compatible.

9.message: The driver installation is complete. Click the {close} button.
